title: CraftyMini single-page landing with category grid and Order Now mailto/Instagram flow

requirements.summary: Create a responsive single-page CraftyMini landing layout with required sections and clear ordering/contact info.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page includes sections: Hero/intro, Browse Our Collection (category grid), Why Choose CraftyMini, Order Now, Contact Us, Footer.
All user-facing text is in English.
Layout is responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop (no horizontal scrolling; cards and form reflow appropriately).

file_operations.description: Implement the single-page landing experience and section layout (Hero, Browse, Why Choose, Order Now, Contact, Footer) with responsive structure and in-page navigation. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card/Button) to provide consistent cards/CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure page metadata supports the landing experience (title already set to CraftyMini; add/adjust description/meta as needed) and confirm language remains English.

requirements.summary: Add an Order Now CTA that scrolls to a validated order form containing all required fields and exact category options.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking Order Now scrolls/focuses to the order form section.
Order form contains all fields listed in the requirement with appropriate input types (e.g., phone input, quantity numeric).
Category field is a select/dropdown with the exact options: Baby Booties, Hair Crochet Clip, Crochet Bow, Crochet Purse, Custom.
Basic validation: required fields cannot be empty; quantity must be >= 1.

file_operations.description: Create the Order Now form component with required fields, basic client-side validation, and a scroll/focus target id. Use shadcn-ui form-related components (e.g., Input, Textarea, Select, Button) to implement accessible controls and consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the Order Now button/CTA to smoothly scroll and focus the Order Now form section (e.g., using refs/element id) and ensure responsive reflow of the form area. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: On form submit, generate a mailto draft for minicrafty63@gmail.com and provide an Instagram DM ordering option with fallback copy/paste content.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the form opens (or provides a button to open) the user’s email client via mailto: addressed to minicrafty63@gmail.com with a prefilled body including all collected fields.
The page includes an Instagram contact link/CTA that displays the handle exactly as provided: @minicrafty.co�.
If mailto cannot be opened, the UI still displays the email address and the generated message body for manual copy/paste.

file_operations.description: Add mailto generation (subject + body with all collected fields) on submission, plus a visible fallback area showing minicrafty63@gmail.com and the generated message body with a copy-to-clipboard action. Include an Instagram DM CTA that displays the handle exactly as '@minicrafty.co�' while linking externally to the closest valid Instagram profile URL. Use shadcn-ui Button/Textarea (or similar) for CTA and message display. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the Order Now section includes a clearly visible Instagram ordering option near the form and that the mailto/fallback UI is discoverable and readable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.summary: Add a Browse Our Collection section with five category cards, descriptive copy, and static placeholder imagery rendered from local generated assets.
acceptanceCriteria: A grid/list of 5 category cards is shown with consistent styling and readable labels.
Each category card shows an image area using provided/generated static assets (not fetched from backend).
Cards are accessible (alt text present; sufficient contrast).

file_operations.description: Create a responsive category grid component with 5 cards (Baby Booties, Hair Crochet Clips, Crochet Bows, Crochet Purses, Custom Orders), each with short descriptive text and an referencing the generated static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated. Use shadcn-ui Card for consistent styling and accessibility. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the CategoryGrid into the 'Browse Our Collection' section and ensure it is reachable via in-page navigation and remains responsive (single-column on small screens, multi-column on larger screens).

requirements.summary: Add a Why Choose CraftyMini section with the four specified bullet points and distinct styling.
acceptanceCriteria: All four bullet points appear on the page in a clearly readable section.
Section is visually distinct from other sections and remains responsive.

file_operations.description: Implement the 'Why Choose CraftyMini' section with the four required bullet points and responsive spacing/typography. Use shadcn-ui Card (or similar) for a visually distinct container when appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the WhyChooseSection to the landing page in the correct order and ensure visual separation between adjacent sections.

requirements.summary: Add a Contact Us section with clickable mailto and Instagram links, while keeping contact info readable as plain text.
acceptanceCriteria: Email is clickable (mailto) and Instagram is clickable (external link).
Contact info is also readable as plain text (in case linking is blocked).

file_operations.description: Create a Contact Us section that displays minicrafty63@gmail.com and '@minicrafty.co�' as plain text plus clickable links (mailto and external Instagram link). Ensure accessible link labels and focus styles. Use shadcn-ui Button for contact CTAs if used. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ContactSection into the page and ensure it is included near the end, before the footer, with responsive layout.

requirements.summary: Establish and apply a cohesive warm handmade/craft theme (non blue/purple primary) across typography, spacing, buttons, cards, and form controls.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is applied consistently to headings, body text, buttons, form controls, and cards.
Primary palette is not blue/purple (unless used only as a minor accent).
UI looks intentional and cohesive on both mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Define global CraftyMini theme tokens (CSS variables used by Tailwind/shadcn styling), typography defaults, and base element styles with a warm craft palette (avoid blue/purple as primary). Ensure consistent spacing and prevent horizontal overflow.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (if needed) to support the CraftyMini warm palette and consistent radius/shadow/typography across sections, while keeping shadcn-compatible tokens intact.

Apply consistent layout primitives and section styling (typography, button variants, card spacing) so the theme is visually cohesive across Hero, grid cards, form controls, and footer. Use shadcn-ui components to standardize UI elements. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the UI with alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: All required images listed in imageRequirements.required exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Images are optimized for web display (reasonable file sizes) and include alt text where applicable.

file_operations.description: Add the generated image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/craftymini-logo.dim_512x512.png (Craft brand wordmark logo with yarn/crochet motif).
Add the generated image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/craftymini-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png (Soft textured hero background pattern).
Add the generated image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/craftymini-cat-booties.dim_800x600.png (Product category placeholder: baby booties).
Add the generated image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/craftymini-cat-clips.dim_800x600.png (Product category placeholder: hair crochet clips).
Add the generated image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/craftymini-cat-bow.dim_800x600.png (Product category placeholder: crochet bow).
Add the generated image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/craftymini-cat-purse.dim_800x600.png (Product category placeholder: crochet purse).
Add the generated image asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/craftymini-cat-custom.dim_800x600.png (Product category placeholder: custom order).

Reference the generated assets in the Hero (logo + background) and in the category cards (five category images), ensuring each image has appropriate alt text and is loaded as a static public asset (no backend routing).
